about_the_game:
A story-driven open world, action-adventure RPG set on a mysterious island where the player takes on the role of Tim.

Tim is living a normal life as a geeky, introverted boy.
He is struggling with his identity and the loss of his best friends, and feels out of place.

The island has a hidden history, a civilization that existed there long ago.
This civilization was able to harness the power of ether, a powerful source of magic or energy, and were able to create advanced technology and develop powerful abilities.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 8GB VRAM / GeForce GTX 1060 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3800X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 5700-XT / GeForce RTX 2070 / Intel Arc A770 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
